name: Escape the Glitch 2: Backrooms
storyline:
In these dimly lit and endless corridors, the glitcher lurks, ready to disrupt your progress at every opportunity. Engage in a heart-pounding game of evasion, using your wits to outsmart this formidable opponent. Remember, direct eye contact freezes the glitcher for a short time, giving you a chance to slip away or move forward strategically.

The glitcher moves unpredictably, advancing only when unseen or after a brief pause following the eye contact freeze. Stay sharp, trust your instincts, and stay ahead of the glitcher's relentless chase. A haunting melody signals when the glitcher momentarily backs off, providing a brief break from the tension.

Immerse yourself in the chilling atmosphere of the Backrooms, where every step brings new dangers and every encounter with the glitcher ramps up the excitement. Can you navigate these treacherous halls, gather all five bottles, and emerge victorious in this thrilling test of skill and survival?

Will you be able to Escape the Glitch in the Backrooms?
summary: Embark on a thrilling adventure deep within the eerie Backrooms in our latest game. Your task remains the same: find five elusive bottles hidden throughout the maze-like corridors while dodging the relentless pursuit of the glitcher.
